 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Instagram\Http\Middleware;
 4: 
 5: use GuzzleHttp\Psr7\Uri;
 6: use League\OAuth2\Client\Token\AccessToken;
 7: use Psr\Http\Message\RequestInterface;
 8: 
 9: final class AuthMiddleware
10: {
11:     /**
12:      * The next handler in the stack.
13:      *
14:      * @var callable
15:      */
16:     protected $nextHandler;
17: 
18:     /**
19:      * The access token used to authenticate requests.
20:      *
21:      * @var AccessToken
22:      */
23:     protected $token;
24: 
25:     /**
26:      * Creates an instance of `AuthMiddleware`.
27:      *
28:      * @param callable $nextHandler
29:      * @param AccessToken $token
30:      *
31:      * @see AuthMiddleware::create()
32:      */
33:     private function __construct(callable $nextHandler, AccessToken $token)
34:     {
35:         $this->nextHandler = $nextHandler;
36:         $this->token       = $token;
37:     }
38: 
39:     /**
40:      * Execute the middleware.
41:      *
42:      * @param RequestInterface $request
43:      * @param array $options
44:      * @return mixed
45:      */
46:     public function __invoke(RequestInterface $request, array $options)
47:     {
48:         $uri     = Uri::withQueryValue($request->getUri(), 'access_token', $this->token->getToken());
49:         $request = $request->withUri($uri)->withHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
50: 
51:         return call_user_func_array($this->nextHandler, [$request, $options]);
52:     }
53: 
54:     /**
55:      * Factory method used to register this class on a handler stack.
56:      *
57:      * @param AccessToken $token
58:      * @return \Closure
59:      */
60:     public static function create(AccessToken $token)
61:     {
62:         return function (callable $handler) use ($token) {
63:             return new static($handler, $token);
64:         };
65:     }
66: }
